amendment.description: Amendment provides that the budgetary treatment of the Transportation Trust Funds covered by the bill will be subject to the provisions of the Line Item Veto Act of 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the budgetary treatment of the Highway Trust Fund, Airport and Airway Trust Fund, Inland Waterways Trust Fund, and the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund would be subject to the provisions of the Line Item Veto Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
